title: Rediscover yourself at Germany’s 1,000-plus wellness hotelsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Rediscover yourself at Germany’s 1,000-plus wellness hotels Published on : Monday, September 21, 2015
Germany’s 1,000-plus wellness hotels are the perfect abode for pure, unadulterated relaxation. A healthy climate, beautiful scenery and the healing powers of water, air and earth make Germany a place where you can truly pamper yourself.
Germany’s quality-certified Wellness-Hotels & Resorts offer so many different ways for you to recharge your batteries. They are Surrounded by the most incredible natural beauty and specialise in relaxing holidays.
Set amid breathtaking landscapes, Germany’s wellness hotels offer spa treatments and healthy food to a wealth of fitness activities.
The establishments awarded four or five stars by the Wellness-Hotels & Resorts quality marque represent the pinnacle of all things wellness. They include the Seeschlösschen resort in Brandenburg, a luxury hotel whose brand-new spa centre combines the traditions of the Ayurveda system of natural healing with modern medical practices.
